# confirm(count:)

**Instance Method**

Confirm this confirmation.

## Declaration

```swift
func confirm(count: Int = 1)
```

## Parameters

- **count**: The number of times to confirm this instance.

## Discussion

As a convenience, this method can be called by calling the confirmation directly.
title: confirm(count:)
